website_summaries.verdict: Resident Evil 2 drags the series' classic formula into a new era and there's never been a better way to experience survival horror.
pros: Resident Evil 2 pulls you into its detailed, atmospheric world and offers a huge amount of fun, challenging content
It manages to stay true to the 1998 original sequel and offers subtle nods to the games that have come in the years since
cons: There are a few uneven gameplay moments, with one enemy hurting the pacing and a brief section that doesn't work as well as the rest

customer_reviews.title: A great make over. this
customer_reviews.text: It can't have been an easy job, improving the entire game, yet managing to keep the original game play. They seem to have done it with this game. From the very beginning this is simply astoundingly good. All the old game is here, yet better, smoother, faster. Some of the original cut scenes have been cut out, and replaced with better scenes. Images are sharp. Colours are subdued and used well. All in all much better than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: P.eterat3

customer_reviews.title: Don't think, JUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: Played the original in the late 90's and have carried on with the franchise over the years. This game does not disappoint, it's managed to keep enough of the original elements to take you back but added a whole lot more. A must buy for any resident evil fan or would be fine as a stand alone game to someone who has never played any of the other games.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Spence

customer_reviews.title: My game of the year 2019 already!
customer_reviews.text: This is classic resident evil made for the modern era. Combining old styled puzzles, exploration and horror with a new angle and engine. Beautiful graphics and exiting gameplay that’s truly scary. Capcom is doing amazing things lately and I’m exited too see what’s next for resident evil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure perfection
customer_reviews.text: An absolute incredible remake, if you enjoyed the old resident evil games decades ago or like horror survival then this remake needs to experienced,atmospheric spooky puzzle solving using maps zombie dogs bone chilling lickers-res evil boss fights,this is the original type resident evil as it should be. With the 2nd run versions unlocked once normal modes completed you essentially get multiple different versions to play,once i started i could not stop playing it really is that addictive....fantastic game pure perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Voodoo Dave

customer_reviews.title: A welcome return to the world of survival horror!
customer_reviews.text: As a huge fan of the original Resident Evil 2, I have been waiting for this game for a long time and I have to say, it does not disappoint. The atmosphere is amongst the creepiest and unsettling I have ever experienced in a game and the combat is frantic and heart-pumping. Capcom have clearly poured a great deal of love and care into this project. Turn the lights and the phone off and immerse yourself in this nightmarish masterpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dated.
customer_reviews.text: My god! I'd forgotten how far games had come before I bought this. You can't duck down, you can't jump, you can't turn without turning your whole body, and it's literally a game where each level is a big puzzle. There's nothing else, just that. I know it's an old game, but I clearly forgot the gist of it. Another thing that bothered me were the headshots that no effect on the zombies walking about the police station. Oh, sorry, you get an extended mag in the police station. Great for classic gamers. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Watson

customer_reviews.title: Resident Evil has finally come home
customer_reviews.text: This is the best recent Resident Evil game. Much better than RE7 as the Re Engine is a lot more realistic and gives the game a creepy atmosphere. I am not far into Claire's scenario but the only thing letting it down is how easy the puzzles are. I recall them making you think a bit harder in the 90s version. If you buy the standard copy, you can upgrade it to delux by downloading the bundle from PSN or Xbox Live. That way you get a physical copy of the game and the extras like costumes and orginal soundtrack which sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is how you do it right.
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say which hasn’t already been said? A favourite from my youth so I was hoping and praying that Capcom would do things right and I can safely say they have gone above and beyond! The atmosphere, the gameplay, the story. It’s still RE2 but the story has much more to it. Just be careful of mr X. He no only appears in the B Scenario....... also I hope one day they will make an update or DLC for original music. As the main police entrance is missing that iconic music!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dantheman

customer_reviews.title: Very good game but frustrating at times
customer_reviews.text: First time I play any of the Resident Evils games. I think this one is an excellent game, lasting a long time. Quite different from what I was expecting, as it's all down to collecting or combining items to unlock further progress. However, it can get frustrating at times, when trying 15 times to defeat a monster, with long load times each attempt and no further help or bonuses. I almost gave up on the game a few times. Even on the lowest difficulty level, this game is too hard for the average player. We seem to be constantly short of ammonition or health kits... Shame because it could have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bobtedd-0811

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the Resident Evil series
customer_reviews.text: This remake was so much fun. A while ago I tried playing the original game on PS3 and it was just... so flipping hard. The tank controls and camera angles and pixellated characters... I couldn't deal with it. But this gave me a chance to play the game and have fun! The A and B stories between Leon and Claire can be a bit disappointing in the sense that they're not hugely different from each other. I was kind of expecting completely different playthroughs but still lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Alex

customer_reviews.title: Remake done right.
customer_reviews.text: Almost finished my first round with Claire and I have to say I’m impressed. Although I definitely did NOT miss Tyrant haha.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Capcom is slaying it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what changed in capcom but my god they have been giving us some good quality stuff as of late.This game is a love letter to the original and it's just made for losers like me who grew up playing the original even though they were too young cause violence didn't affect kids back then! I digress this game plays so good and the recreation of the environments is phenomenal. I am so happy they got red of tank mechanics as well cause in my mind that was an era limitation not a feature like many like to believe, Get over it nerds. Buy this game.
customer_reviews.author: Maku Shenoda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game!! 😉😁
customer_reviews.text: Interesting gameplay. Enjoyed playing as Leon and Claire in the two different scenes. Tyrant is a feller that you can’t even defeat until the end of the game for Leon and as for Claire it’s Sherry’s dad that mutated thing monster from God knows where!! Lol 😆 it would have been nice if they could make them run more faster than what they are running now as I find it slow and I’m sure other players do too. Overall it’s very interesting 😁
customer_reviews.author: Re_Na

customer_reviews.title: Resident Evil Back to its best
customer_reviews.text: Had this on pre order for a while and got it for £37.00 which was absolute bargain. I was at first a bit skeptical about remake as Resident Evil 2 is an absolute classic and resisted the one shot demo and waited for full game. I have to say it is an absolute belter , graphics , sound and overall feel has hit the mark. Playing as Leon at the minute and loving it . Do not hesitate to buy as game of the year so far for me . Bring on Resident evil 3 and Dino Crisis remake
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Resi fans will love this
customer_reviews.text: Had this game since release day. It is fantastic. The first play through is like a labyrinth with puzzles thru ought. Combined with the walking dead, the puzzles become more testing. It is a real challenge. Come 2nd run you feel so much more confident with your surroundings and the game begins to blossom into a compelling story. Only downside, is there is no point / coin system to spend on upgrades like all other resis bar 7. However, as a long time resi fan, this instalment is no let down. Resi 4 will always remain my favourite, but this one has jumped straight into that number 2 spot
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Csesznyak

customer_reviews.title: ULTRA F... AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: my god... im still angry with myself for wait to play this game for so long . im was not a resident evil guy... and i got resident evil ;revelations2 to play with my wife and really like it.. so i decided to give another try on this one that everyo9ne was giving great reviews.. and it changes everything i thought about Resident evil.. congratulations Capcon.. this is a masterpiece and deserves the best reviews . (ps: dont sell it after play.. i did that after i finished... but now i missed :( ... )
customer_reviews.author: artur

customer_reviews.title: Resident evil is back with a bang !
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the years waiting for release . Graphics are stunning and story line is just brilliant , the game it's self is so additive . Zombies are tuffer then ever in hardcore mode . If your resident evil fan buy this game now money no object here , you be stupid not to .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The underwhelming aspect can't be shaken off.
customer_reviews.text: I finished the game once then was about to give up on it entirely. No urge to go back through it. Then I installed the original's soundtrack and played through the campaign with it. It gave the game a new lease of life. But only for a short period before the novelty wore off. This series is dead like Tomb Raider. They need to lay these two series to rest now. They have had their time. There is no spark in the games anymore. The atmosphere is long gone.
customer_reviews.author: Zoon_McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the movies, but this game is dire. The game starts out really well until it turns out that 5 minutes into the game the character must be physically disabled and unable to step over a matchstick without it blocking his way to Racoon city police dept. I'm used to game characters that can jump and climb but this game character is so unrealistically physically useless the game is a farce. Uninstalled the game after a few minutes play. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Probably bias...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I loved the original and played it recently waiting for this to be released and I still really enjoyed it. That being said there are obviously alot if similarities (like a good remake should) but lots if differences as well (also like a good remake should). I will keep this simple, the game is fantastic, looks fantastic and very replayable. It deserves the 9.1 on metacritic!
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: If your a previous fan or new to the franchise, just buy it
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia at its finest
customer_reviews.text: Being a huge fan of the original RE 2 back in the say this was a must buy for me. There is all the same jumps, thrills and chills of the original game in vastly improved graphics. If you loved the original or are looking for a tence and rewarding gaming experience RE2 is your go to
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: second resi game ive played, and i love it
customer_reviews.text: this game is fantastic, love the controls, and they way it feels. first resi game i played was Resi 5 and from what i have found out, that wasn't very well loved by the fanbase. this is true survival horror at its best. get this and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: iain weir

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and plays well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I vaguely remember playing the original when I was younger but it's quite tough to go back to those games without discovering how dated the graphics were. This new version looks stunning with more modern control set. I played through on normal difficulty as Leon and found it mildly challenging with plenty of ammo lying around. I'll be starting my second play through soon as Claire to see how the story differs. Overall, great game and really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: The best resident evil game ever made
customer_reviews.text: This game is awsome i am one of the fans of old school have played all the resident evil games my favorite is resident evil 1 remake but next is this one have played the original back in the 1998 and loved but this one is bigger than the original :) ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rui Macedo

customer_reviews.title: A Stunning Remake Of A Playstation Classic.
customer_reviews.text: This remake of Resident Evil 2 is absolutely stunning in terms of graphics and gameplay , this is a perfect example of how to remake a classic , if you loved Resident Evil 2 on the PS1 back in 1998 then i highly recommend you buy this , Survival horror is back and Resident Evil is back the way it should be played.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: brings it back in a new light
customer_reviews.text: amazing game feels good great gameplay with scary and hard moments for this game a score is a 10/10

customer_reviews.title: Waste of cash
customer_reviews.text: This is shocking.a complete waste of £50. Its clunky,slow,awkward to control and just poor in general. Its nothing like the classic older games. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Robert dazzler

customer_reviews.title: This is a remake of the 1998 Resident Evil 2 video game.
customer_reviews.text: Fans of the original game will be thrilled by this remake. Players take the role of Leon and Claire as they attempt to escape a zombie infested city. Great graphics and a lot of blood, this game is not to be missed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Game
customer_reviews.text: I never played any Resident Evil games as I couldn't brave any sort of zombie games but I gave this a go and loved it. Very puzzle based with good action sequences, the graphics are incredible and its nice to see a beloved game being redone for a modern audience to such a brilliant calibre.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Bird

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Just wow. :)
customer_reviews.text: This completely surpassed my expectations! I’m a huge fan of the original and had been looking forward to this since they announced it, and it was even better than I expected! The original feel of the game has remained intact but it’s been expanded on so much, with new areas, new enemies, and a much deeper and, in some parts, emotional narrative. An essential purchase for pretty much everyone who doesn’t mind a bit of gore in their games!
customer_reviews.author: Randomer23

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Jut great so far Fast delivery on time packed well Great game on PS4 Loved the first one all good
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Time for the brown trousers
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer paranoia don't get this as its out to get YOU from the start Fantastic reimaging of a classic resident evil game Little ammo lots of monsters a nice return to survival horror long overdue.
customer_reviews.author: Tamwood

customer_reviews.title: Makes me excited for how good RE3make will be
customer_reviews.text: This game is something else. I'm not a huge RE fan and bought this on a whim. Well, I was hooked on the gameplay. I've played through all 8 scenarios (A+B on standard and hardcore) and got S+ rank in all. Normally I burn out any game after just a single playthrough. This is definitely worth giving a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen de Groene

customer_reviews.title: I just blew his whole face off from point blank with a shotgun!
customer_reviews.text: Just watch the Angry Joe review for this game. This will be all you'll need to inform you if you're no sure. Just buy this game. And maybe wait for a sale on the 3rd iteration. I hear it's not so great. This version though is just sheer brilliance!
customer_reviews.author: PumpActionPonds

customer_reviews.title: Adding it to my collection of RE Games
customer_reviews.text: Finished it in a few days both Leon and Claire’s part. It’s a lot harder than I thought and passed it over to my son to get me through certain bits as my aiming isn’t quick enough before getting attacked. Solving things isn’t that hard and you’re not always running back and forth to get items etc.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Scary
customer_reviews.text: I have been a resident evil fan for years so when this came out I had to have it great graphics good story scary and awesome love it
customer_reviews.author: Denise Higson

customer_reviews.title: Game of the year 2019 for some
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly how remakes should be done. Won some 2019 game of the year awards and even if it's not my personal game of the year I don't object the choice at all. Superb game! It's so well made that I pre-ordered the next remake (RE3) on announcement. I hope Capcom continues their hot streak.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Vay

customer_reviews.title: Loved the original, love the remake!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this game when it was first released on PS2. Now it's been given a revamp and it is amazing. Overall plot and puzzles are the same, a few tweaks, but still amazing. Gameplay, graphics, characters all breathtaking.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Resident Evil series’s
customer_reviews.text: I own the Resident Evil series on 2 different console so when I saw This so cheap I thought buy It’s my favourite of the resident evil series. Very good game not too many changes but a must buy if you can get it cheap.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Play Value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Game as a gift for my son, who is an avid Gamer. He reports that the game is enjoyable, with good graphics and plenty of play value. Fans of the Resident Evil Franchise will not be disappointed with this edition of the game.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Respect NHS
customer_reviews.text: It's a game that makes your heart beat faster not advised for people with heart problems it's a great game and passes the time in these coronovirus times ,, be prepared to make a light saver out of a screw , and torch save the bullits

customer_reviews.title: A must buy for RE fans and Horror fans
customer_reviews.text: As a huge Resident Evil fan, I must say that this is the best remake of a game. Can only recomend to fans of horror movies and games.
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: An absolutely superb survival horror remake
customer_reviews.text: The game is a superb remake and showcases more modern game technology with a very appreciative nod to the past. Long term re-playability, I'm still playing my copy a year later. Anyone who has not played this yet should purchase prior to RE3 remake due for release 03 April 20.
customer_reviews.author: john hoskins

customer_reviews.title: A brilliant update of a classic!
customer_reviews.text: This game is brilliant! It is faithful to the original but also manages to feel fresh. The game is challenging without being too punishing and has an engaging story. It looks amazing and the sound design really adds to the tension. Buy this game!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gough

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game
customer_reviews.text: It's between of the best games of 2019 and all the time. It's stunning and horrific at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: absolutely 1st class!
customer_reviews.text: this is an amazing remake,works flawlessly, very enjoyable and addictive. lots of new twists it you played the 1st version. i luved it!
customer_reviews.author: kev

customer_reviews.title: good but not great
customer_reviews.text: this is a good game but i felt disappointed when i completed it. its too short, the puzzles do not work in a police station setting as well as they did in the mansion and the biggest disappointment is the 4 stories are nearly identical. should this of been a full priced game. in hindsight i would of purchased it a few months on when the price had dropped, maybe a raid mode should of been added, still i enjoyed what was there the zombie coming out of the darkness of the cafeteria very scary
customer_reviews.author: joe l.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was a very well designed game with excellent graphics and good game play. Only criticism is that it is a fairly short game with limited replay ability, but still fun while it lasts.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game. Great reimagining of the game. Claire is cute.
customer_reviews.author: paul aitken

customer_reviews.title: This is game design
customer_reviews.text: Just finished the second play-through. Incredible. Scary. Beautiful. Well acted, story was great. And really difficult and fun to try and get S rank. Just wish i had more ammo to kill zombies with haha.

customer_reviews.title: Short but enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Never played the original Resident Evil 2 (school friend never let me touch the controller) but this was good, no Last of Us but few games can top that. I only played as Leon, started Clare's story but it just felt like in repetition.
customer_reviews.author: Mehul

customer_reviews.title: GOTY 2019
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best games I've ever played. I've completed the game twice and it still brings me back again for a third time. Also there are 4 more FREE DLC extra games when you complete the game, but to get add on costumes they come at a price of either £9.99 or £11.99, depends if they are on discount from the company Capcom.
customer_reviews.author: Sambora811

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Played the original love it, the remake is just as good as the original, well worth it of you've played the original, if you haven't played the original buy it anyway. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant

customer_reviews.title: A great classic remastered
customer_reviews.text: One of the best resident evils in the series in my opinion and great classic remastered to unbelievable quality as expected on latest generation consoles and i enjoy the story modes and everything else 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best game of the series
customer_reviews.text: I loved the original when I was younger and expected to be disappointed by the remake, but in my opinion it's the best game of the series. There's enough of the original game but with modern graphics and updated controls and playing style (no more fixed cameras and no more door loading screens). I've got back into gaming mainly through this game.

customer_reviews.title: OK but a shadow to the original
customer_reviews.text: Remake 2 is good its kinda sad they removed the bowgun although the sparkshot seems like a worthy replacement or sorts. a must play as a seasoned Resident evil player and fan this is great game much better than RE3 remake which is a disaster honestly please stay away

customer_reviews.title: Resident Evil... 2. Remake.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant. A remake which is well worth a binge. Top graphics, atmosphere to scare you silly. A must-have for resident Evil fans.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing re-master (re-imagining!)
customer_reviews.text: This is how you breathe life into a classic whilst bringing it up to modern video game standards. Scared the hell out of me too.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Classic amazing game. Bought as gift. Used click and collect in next. Great service. Product arrive on time no issues. Packaged well and no quality problems with Game. Bought as gift

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game! Highly recommended for the fans of the saga!
customer_reviews.text: The game is amazing and it’s a gem for the fans of the saga! I pre ordered the game and it arrived promptly on the release date. The whole purchasing experience was very smooth and impeccable.

product_meta.title: Resident Evil 2 (PS4)
product_meta.description:
Platform:PlayStation 4| Edition:StandardGAME OVERVIEW 

 The genre-defining masterpiece Resident Evil 2 returns, completely rebuilt from the ground up for a deeper narrative experience. Using Capcom's proprietary RE Engine, Resident Evil 2 offers a fresh take on the classic survival horror saga with breathtakingly realistic visuals, heart-poundingly immersive audio, a new over-the-shoulder camera, and modernized controls on top of gameplay modes from the original game. The nightmares return reimagined for the PlayStation4, Xbox One and PC. 

 In Resident Evil 2, the classic action, tense exploration, and puzzle solving gameplay that defined the Resident Evil series returns. Players join rookie police officer Leon Kennedy and college student Claire Redfield, who are thrust together by a disastrous outbreak in Raccoon City that transformed its population into deadly zombies. Both Leon and Claire have their own separate playable campaigns, allowing players to see the story from both characters' perspectives. The fate of these two fan favourite characters is in players hands as they work together to survive and get to the bottom of what is behind the terrifying attack on the city. Will they make it out alive?.
feature_bullets: A spine-chilling reimagining of a horror classic - Based on the original PlayStation console release in 1998, the new game has been completely rebuilt from the ground up for a deeper narrative experience

A whole new perspective - New over-the-shoulder camera mode and modernized control scheme creates a more modern take on the survival horror experience and offers players a trip down memory lane with the original gameplay modes from the 1998 release

Terrifyingly realistic visuals - Built on Capcom's proprietary RE Engine, Resident Evil 2 delivers breathtakingly photorealistic visuals in 4K whilst stunning lighting creates an up-close, intense and atmospheric experience as players roam the corridors of the Raccoon City Police Department (RPD)
Face the grotesque hordes - Zombies are brought to life with a horrifyingly realistic wet gore effect as they react in real time taking instant visible damage, making every bullet count

Iconic series defining gameplay - Engage in frenzied combat with enemies, explore dark menacing corridors, solve puzzles to access areas and collect and use items discovered around the environment in a terrifying constant fight for survival

See favorite characters in a whole new light - Join rookie police officer Leon S. Kennedy on his first day in the job and college student Claire Redfield, who is searching for her brother amidst a terrifying zombie epidemic
Step into the rookie shoes of both heroes - Enjoy separately playable campaigns for both Leon and Claire, allowing players to see the story from both characters' perspective
